resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/104277</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>104277</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206574</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">The Amistad Case</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Der Amistad Fall</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le Cas d'Amistad</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O Exemplo De Amistad</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il Caso Di Amistad</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η περίπτωση Amistad</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El Caso De Amistad</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">presents documents produced around and during the historic 1841 trial of 53 Africans, captured and sold as slaves, and subsequently accused of murder for commandeering the slave ship, Amistad, and killing its captain and cook. The site also contains a detailed lesson plan.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Geschenkdokumente produziert um und während den 
historischen Versuch 1841 von 53 Afrikanern, erfaßt und verkauft als 
Sklaven und vom Mord für commandeering das Sklavenschiff, Amistad und
das Beenden seines Kapitäns und Kochs nachher beschuldigt. Die 
Site enthält auch einen ausführlichen Lektionplan.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">documents de présents produits autour et pendant 
de l'épreuve 1841 historique de 53 Africains, capturés et vendus 
sous le nom d'esclaves, et ultérieurement accusés du meurtre pour 
commandeering le bateau slave, Amistad, et détruire son 
capitaine et cuisinier. Le site contient également un plan 
détaillé de leçon.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">originais de presentes produzidos em torno e 
durante da experimentação 1841 historic de 53 africanos, capturados 
e vendidos como escravos, e acusados subseqüentemente do assassinato 
commandeering o navio slave, Amistad, e matar seus capitão e 
cozinheiro. O local contem também uma planta detalhada da 
lição.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">presenti documenti redatti intorno e durante la 
prova storica 1841 di 53 Africani, bloccati e venduti sotto il nome di
schiavi e successivamente accusati dell'omicidio per commandeering la 
nave slave, Amistad ed uccisione il relativi capitano e cuoco. 
Il luogo egualmente contiene un programma dettagliato di 
lezione.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">παρουσιάζει τα έγγραφα που παράγονται γύρω από και 
κατά τη διάρκεια την ιστορική δίκη 1841 53 Αφρικανών, που 
συλλαμβάνονται και που πωλούνται ως σκλάβοι, και που κατηγορούνται
στη συνέχεια για τη δολοφονία για το σκάφος σκλάβων, Amistad, 
και τη δολοφονία του καπετάνιου και του μάγειρά του. Η 
περιοχή περιέχει επίσης ένα λεπτομερές σχέδιο μαθήματος.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">documentos de presentes elaborados alrededor y 
durante del ensayo histórico 1841 de 53 africanos, capturados y 
vendidos como esclavos, y acusados posteriormente del asesinato para 
requisar la nave auxiliar, Amistad, y matar a su capitán y cocinero. 
El sitio también contiene un plan detallado de la lección.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Sciences Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciências Sociais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienze Sociali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνικές επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencias Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206574</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Custom License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>104277</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/the-amistad-case</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
